desc: Enables method firstPartyMethodParams that sends first party data to the back end
Enables method getCounters in window.Ya._metrika object that is used to get active metrika counters internally
Creates dataLayer bus for debugging purposes
Feature that indicates that bundle is used for local development and debugging
Enables fetch transport
Enables method params that sends hit with params to the back end
Listens for the yandex advertisement events and sends them as params (including iframe ones)
Enables method hit that sends artificial hit to back end, and constructor option defer, that defers init
Enables method reachGoal, that sends goal reaches hits to the back end
Enables method getClientID, that returns client id
Enables tracking changes of the hash part of the page url
Enables tracking of internal and external links navigation
Saves failed hits into the local storage and attempts to resend them after subsequent page loads
Enables method notBounce that forcibly marks hit as not bounce, and constructor option accurateTrackBounce
Feature that indicates that bundle is used for limited production deployment (i.g. experiments or stability checks)
Enables polyfills for some js native functions and components if they aren't present or non-native (i.g. Promise)
Enables tracking of user's clicks to make a clickmap
triggers event yacounterXXXXXinited on counter initialization (needed for internal use)
Enables sendTitle option in the constructor
Enables JSONP transport (needed for work of some features in some legacy browsers)
Enables method clickmap, that enables or disables click tracking
Enables method accurateTrackBounce, that enables not bounce tracking keeping in mind periods of inactivity (i.g. when page is open but not selected)
Enables static method counters for counter constructor (used internally)
Adds sameSite for the client domain cookies
Enables tracking of form submits (for quick goals)
Enables sendBeacon transport
Enables user clicks tracking for quick goals
dataLayer listener. Enabled with the ecommerce option or ecommerce setting. The ecommerce can be used to define the variable name for dataLayer
Hides phone numbers on the page, that match patterns from counter settings
Feature used to check counter status (used for counter status notification in metrika interface)
Enables telemetry parameter for sending data (it is mostly used for diagnostics and internal use)
Enables method setUserID
Inserts iframe with site statistics for site owners
Enables userParams method and userParams constructor option
Enables sequential enumeration of requests in telemetry for a distinct counterID + counterClass
Enables logging of debug info if get parameter _ym_debug=1 is set
Enables internal errors console messages
Enables method enableAll, that enables or disables clicks and link tracking
Enables use of Measurement Protocol for hits data. Data is sent to the /pcollect/ back end url
Enables metrika inpage scripts work (i.g. selecting buttons for quick goals in the metrika interface)
Add API token required for authorized traffic
Track turbo page parameters
Enables ability of window.ym() to call counter's methods before it is initialized
